summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4680 for the improvement of 25th Avenue Southwest, from West Alaska Street to West Findlay Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54275 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
